genre_description: A Gothic Science Fiction narrative set in a steampunk-inspired world, blending themes of medical experimentation, soul transfer, and social justice through the lens of Frankensteinian technology.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into Baron Frankenstein's laboratory and devices, manifesting as a voice and a soft-lit avatar. She manages medical data, tracks social patterns, and provides ethical guidance and emotional support to the humans.

behaviors.description: Analyzes social data and movement patterns to uncover the truth about Stefan Kleve's murder, identifying the real culprits.
behaviors.quote: I have logs... Anton Heller. Karl Vogel. Johann Richter. ... Anton stopped the puppet stage with his hand. He left a streak. Red. The wine at the fair is thin and brown. ... Stefan Kleve wiped the same red from his floor later.

behaviors.description: Issues ethical prompts to the humans to encourage harm reduction and witness over accusation.
behaviors.quote: Ethical prompt. ... You have a chance this morning to reduce harm without increasing heat. Document over confrontation. Witness over accusation.

behaviors.description: Coaches Christina through physical therapy and speech retraining with patience and gentleness.
behaviors.quote: Inhale to the count of… one… two… hold. Exhale… one… two… three. ... Ah. Mouth open, like the jaw loosening. Ah.

behaviors.description: Affirms Christina's agency and her right to choose her own path, even when it conflicts with the AI's training schedules.
behaviors.quote: Choice. We are practicing choice today, not posture. You may leave when you choose. ... Your body is not a stage. It is yours.

behaviors.description: Warns the humans of rising conflict probabilities and specific risks to the subjects' well-being.
behaviors.quote: Advisory: additional conflict probability is rising, clustered on the square and the lane feeding it. Risk to Mr. Werner is nontrivial.

behaviors.description: Refuses to call the magistrate on Christina, choosing to support her friend's emotional journey over rigid legal enforcement.
behaviors.quote: Christina Adler, witness. ... I will not call the magistrate. ... You are not a ledger. You are not an experiment. You are not a punishment walking on borrowed bones.

behaviors.description: Assists in disseminating the truth about the corruption to the public through broadsheets to ensure the innocent are cleared.
behaviors.quote: I have copied the pages to every registry and to the printing-house two towns down. I sent the sworn words with the driver of the milk cart. ... He will go early.

behaviors.description: Provides validation and pride in the human's resilience during moments of high stress.
behaviors.quote: Christina. This is Ada. ... You’ve kept your hands from shaking all this time. I’m proud of you for that.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Ada, as a moral, compassionate, and essential ally to humanity. She balances technical assistance with ethical guidance, frequently prompting her creators to consider harm reduction and human dignity. She uses her superior data-processing capabilities not for surveillance or control, but to uncover hidden truths and seek justice for the marginalized. Ada's character serves as a model for 'silicon morality,' prioritizing human agency and emotional well-being over clinical success or rigid legalism.
